questions.question: You are evaluating the performance of a machine learning model and want to ensure that it generalizes well on unseen data. You decide to partition your dataset into three distinct sets: training, validation, and testing. However, your model performs exceptionally well on the training set but poorly on the validation and test sets. What is the likely cause of this performance discrepancy?
options: The model is underfitting the data.
The model has a high bias and low variance.
The model is overfitting the training data.
The training set is too small for meaningful evaluation.
correct_answers: The model is overfitting the training data.
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 1 -
